tokens.text: indexes file paths for lookup and search

title: Info Set Index
description: Lookup map that correlates files discovered during analysis.

fields.title: Items
fields.description: Flattened list of file paths that were indexed for quick lookup.

fields.title: Trie
fields.description: Sparse trie keyed by tokenised path segments for accelerated search. The structure is generator-specific and may contain deeply nested objects.
